name: Melange Leather Sectional
description:
Inspired by the classic Tuxedo-style sofa, Moroni worked with renowned designer Stanley Jay Friedman to create this sophisticated piece. A comprehensive sofa, chair, and sectional seating collection, the Melange features a movable bolster and steel sled leg bases, bringing together the best of modern and classic for an elegance fit for the 21st century.

Sofa: 92W x 39.5D x 31H
Loveseat: 74W x 39.5D x 31H
Chair: 44W x 39.5D x 31H
Ottoman: 45W x 24D x 15.5H
Single Arm Chaise: 38W x 70D x 31H
Single Arm Loveseat: 64W x 39.5D x 31H
Bumper: 84W x 39.5D x 31H

Available in a wide variety of top-grain Italian leathers

Shown and priced in grade D leather.

name: Teva Leather Sectional
description:
Moroni's Teva Leather Sectional is sleek, modern and functional. The piece is available in a wide variety of top-grain Italian leathers wrapping a North American hardwood frame.

 114" x 103" x 32"

Shown and priced in Grade B Dove White leather.

name: Arturo Lounge Chair
description:
A delightful reproduction of Arne Jacobsen's unique Swan Chair for the SAS Royal Hotel in Copenhagen, the Arturo chair is undeniably sleek and modern. 

Available in red or black fabric.

27"w x 29.25"d x 30"h

name: Eiffel Wood Dining
description: Eiffel Wood  is a contemporary chair with a comfortable upholstered seat and backrest on a solid walnut beech. The seat has a steel structure with “S” shape springs for extra flexibility and strength. This steel frame is molded by injecting polyurethane foam. Eiffel seat is upholstered with a removable velcro, enclosed leather, PPM, leatherette, wool as well as Camira organic wool slip cover. Eiffel Wood  may be upholstered with variety of other colors as a special order with a minimum of 8 required. The chair is suitable for both residential and commercial use.

name: Mode Modular Sectional
description:
This clean, modular piece is highly configurable for both large and small houses and apartments. Rotate the chaise to form an extra long sofa with a gap in the back, or choose from our many custom sizes to transform any living space.

As shown: 121W X 65D X 26H
Shipped custom in 4-6 weeks

name: Pacific Sectional
description:
The uniquely tufted pacific sectional is sure to delight in any context. Pacific's tufted back and sides allow the piece to float in a room effectively. This sofa is custom made here in the USA and is available in any of our many fabrics. Pacific also looks fabulous in leather, call for a quote.

As shown: 119 W X 65 D x 27 H

name: Uno Chair
description:
Uno is available in any of Moroni's many top-grain Italian leathers, and is as comfortable as it is stylish. Trapezoidal steel legs and shapely cushions give Uno a strong presence in any room.

Stocked and priced in Grade D Leather.

Also available in sofa and ottoman.

26.5" W x 34.5" D x 30" H

name: Curt Side Chair
description: Curt sums up American modernity with it's beautifully curved Walnut veneer back and chrome legs. The piece features wonderfully detailed fabric upholstery and makes a wonderful addition to modern dining tables.

name: Constellation Pendants
description:
Small and large pendant lamps that cast a pattern of light on walls. The pieces are zinc plated iron with hand drilled holes.

Small: 7.875" Dia x 7.5"H
Large: 10.25"Dia x 9.75"H

name: Barnet Leather Sofa
description:
The beautiful Barnet leather sectional is as cozy as it is pretty. The piece is available in a variety of sectional pieces as well as the classic 2 arm sofa we have on our floor.

2 Arm Sofa: 94" W x 37" D x 29.5" H $2724

name: Eiffel Wood Dining MW Chair
description:
Eiffel Wood is a contemporary dining chair with a comfortable upholstered seat and backrest on wooden dowel legs. Eiffel MW has metal legs available in black powder, natural as well as stainless steel finishes. Black wires are used with natural metal legs and chrome wires are used with black powdered metal legs.  Eiffel seat is upholstered with a removable velcro, enclosed leather, PPM, leatherette, wool as well as Camira organic wool slip cover. Designed by sohoConcept team. 

Seat colors:
Wool: Black, Dark Grey, Red, Sky Blue, Pistachio, Orange, Turquoise
Leatherette: Black, Red, White, Orange, Sky blue, Brown, Green

name: Karma Sectional - Made in USA
description:
The Karma sectional offers mid-century influences like gracefully tapered legs and tufted back cushions and seats.  Foam core back cushions add a nice firmness that many people prefer.  We also can cover this in made in USA top grain leathers.

Made in USA.
Kiln dried hardwood frames with lifetime warranty.
Sinuous spring base.
Choose from hundreds of design grade fabrics and leg finishes.
Custom sizes and configurations available.
Foam core/poly wrap seat cushion, foam core/poly wrapped back cushions.  

Down fill cushion options are available.

Available in Sofas, loveseats, chairs and ottomans.

As shown:
113W x 33H x 65D

name: Andrew Bi-sectional - Made in USA
description:
The Andrew sofa sectional is a stand alone sofa with arm chaise that can be used on either side of sofa.  You can also float the chaise piece for other uses.  Our everyday sale price includes over 500 fabric choices.  

Made in USA. 
Kiln dried hardwood frames with lifetime warranty. 
Sinuous spring base. 
Choose from hundreds of design grade fabrics and leg finishes. 
Full custom to the inch and configuration options.
Foam core ploy wrapped seat cushions, with tight back foam and poly backs.
Attached seat cushion standard, optional removable cushions.

Down fill seat cushions are an option.

We can also cover this in made in USA top grain leathers.

Available in sofas, loveseats, chairs and ottomans.

81.5W X 79D (Sofa: 33D) X 31H

name: Malta Bookcase with Drawers
description:
Malta Combination is designed to offer quality, versatility and affordability to enhance any room in a house or small office, while enabling you to express your own style. Stack them high against the wall, or arrange them low on the floor, the possibilities are endless. Structure of the Malta Bookcase is made out of MDF with oak veneer. Malta Bookcase is designed by Tayfur Ozkaynak.

name: Malta Sideboard
description:
Malta Combination is designed to offer quality, versatility and affordability to enhance any room in a house, while enabling you to express your own style. Malta Sideboard is a multipurpose piece. It’s your choice to use in the dining room, bedroom and hallway or even as media storage.  It has two drawers and two doors. The doors -equipped with gas lift mechanisms- open onto two shelves which are height-adjustable to suit individual needs. Solid steel sleigh legs plated with polished chrome. Malta Cabinets and Malta Shelves can be stacked on this sideboard.

76W X 31.5H X 18D

name: Malta Cabinet

Stack them high against the wall, or arrange them low on the floor, the possibilities are endless. Gas lift mechanisms of the door openings add more elegance and comfort to the cabinets. Malta Cabinets can be stacked together with another Malta Cabinet or with Malta Shelves. Structure of the cabinet is made out of MDF with oak veneer. Malta Cabinet designed by Tayfur Ozkaynak.
